en.Stage1Scene1TextBox1: Where am I? What is this place?
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox2: I should have a look around. I can move with the WASD keys or the arrow keys.
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox3: There is a wall blocking my way. I can jump over it with the Space Bar.
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox4: Oh, look, a parrot! I wonder if it can talk?
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox6: I’m Polly. Welcome to the Pattern Islands. A mystic set of islands that are filled with pattern-based puzzles.
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox7: Look ahead. There is a numbered sphere. Go ahead and walk over it to collect it. It will be added to your inventory.
en.Stage1Scene1TextBox8: You can open the inventory with the button on the top of the screen or use the I key.
